welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Theux, Belgium! Get ready to fall in love with our charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and stunning natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Theux has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for cargo operations, handling a large volume of freight and air mail.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
